scripts.migrate:save: export $(egrep -v '^#' .env | xargs) && cd back && npx prisma migrate save --experimental
scripts.migrate:up: export $(egrep -v '^#' .env | xargs) && cd back && npx prisma migrate up --experimental
scripts.dev:back: cd back && npx nodemon --ext ts,graphql --watch 'src/*' --ignore 'src/**/*.spec.ts' --exec 'ts-node' src/index.ts
scripts.install: yarn deps && yarn generate && yarn build
scripts.dev: yarn dev:front & yarn dev:back & docker-compose up
